title: League crashes my computer
body:
I was playing league when my computer shoved the infamous blue screen in my face saying thread stuck in device driver and then restarted. Happenns only when playing league and now i have a leaverbuster ...
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} 
This happened to me before and all i had to do was update a couple of things. But now everything is fully up to date (including bios) and it happened again.
Any tips?

replies.body: This sounds pretty severe if you're getting a blue screen.  :(  Double check your air vents to make sure there's no overheating, then hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can look into this with you directly to look for some options.
